_header: Come here my cousin Gawain so gay
Title(s): King Arthur and the King of Cornwall
_description: King Arthur and the King of Cornwall — 301 lines in quatrains

BLAdd27879.First Lines:
Come here my cozen Gawain so gayMy sister sonne be
                    yee…
